dict.acceptation: 注视，注意；看守，监视；守候（机会等）；密切注意；
表；值夜，值班；看守，监视；值班人员；

sent.orig: If two witches would watch two watches, which witch would watch which watch?
sent.trans: 如果两个巫婆要看守两只手表，那么哪个巫婆会看守哪只手表？

sent.orig: Advertisement watch, Gift watch, Pocket watch.
South Carrick Hall is just a place to sleep, study, and watch my roommate watch TV.
sent.trans: 南卡尔克宿舍404房只是一个睡觉、学习和看着我室友看电视的地方。

sent.orig: Now watch my mouth, please watch and do the same.
sent.trans: 注意观察我的口型，然后照着做。

sent.orig: A run-down watch is still a watch and can be rewound.
sent.trans: 手表停了还是手表，还能重新上紧发条。
